component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.webapp.treesorter.TreeSorterService
component.documentation:
Tree Sorter Service - the tree elements are sorted based on the implementation registered with the extension point.
The default implementation can be overriden by a custom one.
This tree sorter is not used if a queryModel is used in the treeManagerPlugin extension point.
@author Catalin Baican (cbaican@nuxeo.com)
